summary:
QAnon is a harmful conspiracy theory that started in the U.S. in 2017. It began online, claiming that a group of powerful people, including politicians and celebrities, were involved in a secret child sex ring. The theory's followers believe former President Trump was fighting against this group.

QAnon's ideas are not true and have led to dangerous actions. Its supporters have spread lies, caused violence, and even tried to stop the 2020 election results. Many social media platforms now ban QAnon content to prevent its spread.
title: QAnon
